tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr.Akshara is calm and composed and makes efforts to explain the situations why problems arise. She explained the entire RCT procedure to make me feel comfortable and confident. She also suggested i go with some aesthetic treatments for my teeth..a problem long pending for me that was addressed by her.
Am extremely satisfied with her treatment..her expertise and experience, her attitude as she was extremely helpful in explaining all dental related queries which helped me take right decisions.
